item.title: Adobe Alternatives
item.description:
Alternatives to Adobe Software

Below are alternatives to Adobe Software that can be used either online or for download

Photoshop - Download

  • GIMP

Photoshop - Web Based

  • Photopea
  • Pixlr
  • Remove

Illustrator - Web Based

  • VECTR
  • Vectorpea
  • Boxy SVG
  • Gravit Designer

Illustrator - Download

  • Inkscape

Lightroom - Web Based

  • Fotor

Premiere - Web Based

  • Adobe Express
  • Canva

Premiere - Download

  • Shotcut

In-Design - Download

  • Scribus

In-Design - Web Based

  • Canva

item.title: Social Media Dimensions
item.description:
General Suggestions:

Always design square photos to 1080x1080 and shrink them to the appropriate size. Phone sized pictures/videos (instagram story, tiktok video) are 1080x1920.

Social Media

Instagram Post: 1080x1080 Instagram Story: 1080x1920 TikTok Profile Picture: 200x200 TikTok Video: 1080x1920 Facebook Banner: 820x312 Facebook Profile Picture: 1080x1080 Twitter Profile Picture: 400x400

Gaming

Discord Profile Picture: 120x120 Xbox Gamerpic: 1080x1080 Playstation Avatar: 440x440 Steam Pic: 184x184
